程序包 com.pi.pano

接口 MediaPlayerSurfaceView.VideoPlayListener

  • 封闭类:
    MediaPlayerSurfaceView
    public static interface MediaPlayerSurfaceView.VideoPlayListener

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void onPlayControlInit​(MediaPlayerSurfaceView.IVideoPlayControl playControl, int ret)
      Initialization.
      void onPlayControlRelease​(MediaPlayerSurfaceView.IVideoPlayControl playControl)
      release.
      void onPlayStateChange​(MediaPlayerSurfaceView.IVideoPlayControl playControl, int state)
      Play status change.
      void onPlayTimeChange​(MediaPlayerSurfaceView.IVideoPlayControl playControl, float currentTime, float videoDuration)
      Play time update.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onPlayControlInit

        void onPlayControlInit​(MediaPlayerSurfaceView.IVideoPlayControl playControl,
                       int ret)
        Initialization. After the initialization is successful, playControl can be used to play.
        参数:
        ret - 0：success；not 0：fail

      • onPlayControlRelease

        void onPlayControlRelease​(MediaPlayerSurfaceView.IVideoPlayControl playControl)
        release. The playControl cannot be used anymore after release.

      • onPlayStateChange

        void onPlayStateChange​(MediaPlayerSurfaceView.IVideoPlayControl playControl,
                       int state)
        Play status change.
        参数:
        state - last state.

      • onPlayTimeChange

        void onPlayTimeChange​(MediaPlayerSurfaceView.IVideoPlayControl playControl,
                      float currentTime,
                      float videoDuration)
        Play time update.
        参数:
        currentTime - current video play time
        videoDuration - total time
